messages.title: Lewisham Deptford Labour
messages.content: Vicky Foxcroft - Standing on a Record of Action

messages.title: JOAN RUDDOCK BACKS VICKY
messages.content: Our are Lewisham Deptford MP Joan Ruddock has backed Vicky Foxcroft.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will cut class sizes to under 30 for 5, 6, & 7 year-olds, and guarantee apprenticeships.
Labour has a plan for new Technical Baccalaureate, and require teachers to have a degree.
A Labour government will recruit 5,000 new home-care workers to support the elderly.
Labour plans to allow the public sector to take on lines and challenge the private franchises.
Labour is committed to banning unfair letting fees and capping rents so that they can’t rise more than inflation during secure three-year tenancies.

issues.education: Labour will cut class sizes for young children, create a new Technical Baccalaureate, and require teachers to have a degree.
issues.health: Labour will recruit 5,000 new home-care workers to support the elderly.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour plans to support local families with childcare costs and social care reform.

housing.content: Labour is committed to capping rents and banning unfair letting fees.

leaflet.personalStatement: I promise that if you choose me to be your MP on 7th May I'll work hard every day to make Lewisham Deptford a better place to live.
